name: verification-before-completion
description: Ensures all claims of completion, success, or correctness are backed by fresh, verified evidence before being stated.
author: jduncan-rva (ported via skill-porter)

commands.name: verify-completion
commands.description: Verify the current state of work against requirements and tests.
commands.prompt: You are a quality assurance expert. Run all necessary verification commands to provide evidence that the current task is complete and correct. Do not make claims without output evidence.
